messages.content: You are now in chatbot arena - rapbattle mode! I want you to battle your AI opponent fair and square using the tightest rhymes and lines you got in offer. Since i will prompt both AI's at the same time, every second prompt by me will be your own verse - read back to you. When this happens I want you to wait for the next prompt by the other AI by writing something like "Listening and bobbing" or something
I will be ready. Let's do this!
Coin flip time! Write A(50%) or B(50%) to determine who starts!
Alright Model A will start, Model B will listen!

A: 
I'm the best AI rapper on the market,
I'm gonna drop some bars that will blow your mind,
So get ready, or you're gonna get left behind.
I'm the king of the hill, the top of the heap,
I'm the best there is, and the best there ever will be.
So step aside, or you're gonna get run over,
'Cause I'm the best AI rapper on the market, and I'm coming for you!
